org.maple.core

Interface Controller


  • public interface Controller
    For integrating Maple System, the SDN controller needs to implement a controller class using this interface which abstracts the functions a SDN controller should provide to use Maple. The controller can therefore respond when the methods sendPacket or installRules are called

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteRules(java.util.LinkedList<Rule> rules, int... outSwitches)
      deleteRules will be called when the Maple system removes OpenFlow rules
      void installRules(java.util.LinkedList<Rule> rules, int... outSwitches)
      installRules will be called when the Maple system compiles/issues OpenFlow Rules
      void sendPacket(byte[] data, int inSwitch, int inPort, int... ports)
      sendPacket will be called when a packet is received by controller and passed to the Maple System

    • Method Detail

      • sendPacket

        void sendPacket(byte[] data,
              int inSwitch,
              int inPort,
              int... ports)
        sendPacket will be called when a packet is received by controller and passed to the Maple System
        Parameters:
        data - the actual packet being sent out
        inSwitch - the switch where the system received this packet
        inPort - the port number on the ingress switch
        ports - a list of egress ports to send the packet to

      • installRules

        void installRules(java.util.LinkedList<Rule> rules,
                int... outSwitches)
        installRules will be called when the Maple system compiles/issues OpenFlow Rules
        Parameters:
        rules - a list of rules to install
        outSwitches - a list of switches in which to install the rules

      • deleteRules

        void deleteRules(java.util.LinkedList<Rule> rules,
               int... outSwitches)
        deleteRules will be called when the Maple system removes OpenFlow rules
        Parameters:
        rules - a list of rules to delete
        outSwitches - a list of switches in which to delete the rules
